question: How to hide Pickup/RTO address in the label?
steps: From the Dashboard, navigate to the 'Settings' section.
Scroll down to locate the 'Label Settings' tab.
Within Label Settings, locate the option labeled 'Show RTO'.
Disable the 'Show RTO' toggle or icon.
outcome: The Pickup/RTO address will no longer appear on the shipping label.
note: You can enable this setting again anytime if you wish to show the RTO address on labels.
